channel.title: Matilda Lutz on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Matilda Lutz on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Matilda Lutz Talks ‘Red Sonja’ and Returning to the Action Genre 8 Years After ‘Revenge’
item.description: After her audition, the star received a call from director MJ Bassett, but was too nervous to answer and find out if she’d landed the job to play a very different type of bikini-clad warrior.
